name: Mahjong Uranai Fortuna-Tsuki no Megami Tachi
name_original: Mahjong Uranai Fortuna-Tsuki no Megami Tachi
description:
Purchase this PS one® Classic and play it on both your PS3™ and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) systems!

If you have been seeking a way to play the ancient game of mahjong and possibly get your fortune read by an adorable girl, then Mahjong Uranai Fortuna ~Tsuki no Megami Tachi~ is just the groundbreaking game you are looking for.

Choose 3 opponents from the 6 charming choices and engage in the classic four-man match up mahjong play style. If you don't give it your best, you will end up losing everything!

Don't worry, if you lose, you still walk away with a fortune...

Download this PS one® Classic today!

Transferring to a PSP® system from your PS3™ system:

You must be signed into the PlayStation®Network account that originally purchased the game. You must have at least 292 MB free on your Memory Stick Duo™. Connect your PSP® system to your PS3™ system with a USB cable and switch your PSP® system to USB Mode. Highlight the game on the PS3™ XMB™, press the Δ button and select Copy.

PC Store Customers:
Log into your PlayStation®Network account that you originally used to purchased the game. Then, download the game from your "Download List" in the PlayStation®Store onto your PS3™ system.

This title has been converted from the original PlayStation® disc to the PSP® and the PS3™ systems. Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation® disc version, or where some features may not function properly. This version does not support PlayStation® peripherals (controller, memory card, multitap, etc.), therefore functionalities such as multiplayer, versus, and co-op modes are not available.
